author: vors
body:
Fix our ResGen to make LocalAccounts work
Move LocalAccounts ps1xml, psd1 files on the filesystem
Move LocalAccounts ps1xml, psd1 files from powershell/map.json to Modules/map.json
Fix indentation in project.json
Add info about dummy dependencies
build.psm1: Add Copy-MappedFiles -WhatIf switch
Add first version of docs/building/internals.md
Update .gitignore

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa I don't want to interrupt your #1116 so holding on it

title: Fixes for local-account and process
